analysis.description:
Pinakion.balances (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#277-279) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#376-412)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#484-505)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#577-591)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#602-613)
Pinakion.isContract (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#676-685) is declared view but contains assembly code

BlockHashRNGFallback.saveRN (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#870-885) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _block < block.number && randomNumber[_block] == 0

Reentrancy in Kleros.passPeriod (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#1233-1250):
	External calls:
	- rng.requestRN(rnBlock) (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#1236)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- period (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#1236-1238)

Reentrancy in Kleros.passPeriod (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#1233-1250):
	External calls:
	- randomNumber = rng.getUncorrelatedRN(rnBlock) (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#1239-1241)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- period (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#1245)

Reentrancy in Kleros.passPeriod (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#1233-1250):

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastPeriodChange (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#1249)

Pinakion.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#708-725) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#721-722)

Pinakion.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#644-645) shadows:
	- Pinakion.min (function @ /unique_chucks/31/0x3607608a1907acc2042eb83195ffe733b04f0ed4.sol#687-688)

PEpsilon.settle has external calls inside a loop:

PEpsilon.settle has external calls inside a loop:

PEpsilon.settle has external calls inside a loop:
